name: cp20231018-BusinessRulesAsEditableFormat

metadata.Purpose: Expect Success: Context is set on the delivery option, so it will be present in the BusinessRule_*.js files. For loop counter edited externally to 11 and should be reflected upon installation.

signedGlobalXml:
<STEP-ProductInformation ContextID="Context1"  WorkspaceID="Main"  ExportTime="2023-10-18 15:20:08"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <BusinessRules>
    <BusinessRule ID="Create10Items" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="node" type="Node" contract="CurrentObjectBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
var children = node.getChildren();
if (children==null || children.size()==0) {
	logger.info("No Children on "+node.getID());
	for (var i=0; i<10; i++) {
		node.createProduct("","Item");
	}
}
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Create 10 Items</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
    <BusinessRule ID="Create10Leafs" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="node" type="Node" contract="CurrentObjectBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
var children = node.getChildren();
if (children==null || children.size()==0) {
	for (var i=0; i<10; i++) {
		node.createProduct("","Tree");
	}
}
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Create 10 Leafs</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
  </BusinessRules>
</STEP-ProductInformation>
